overview: Mark Wolff unleashes a new breed of rough, raw, underground strip wresting/body worship videos- unlike anything you have seen from him in the past. Global Underground was shot in Brazil and Argentina and features some of South AmericaÂ¹s top body beautifuls. Match One features Mark and Argentina's #1 Exotic Dancer: Ricky Valletta. Ricky has a chiseled GQ face and body to match! Next, Mark flies to Rio de Janeiro, and connects with three Brazilian muscle studs at a local gym. After all the pumping and flexing, Mark gets the two younger hunks into a pro ring for match two. Hernan is a 21 year old ultra ripped ultimate fighter. Pablo is a 22 year old "total package" - beautiful face and tight symmetrical physique. The final match pits Mark against very beefy body builder, Rocha. For the fans that prefer a more bulked up Mark Wolff, he weighs in at a massive 220 pounds for this battle. Get your passport ready! Mark Wolff is taking you on a sexy, new trip!
title: Global Underground 1
